items.sentence: Tom told Mary he was planning to go camping with John.
Tom told Mary that he wanted to go to Boston with her.
Tom told everyone in the room about what had happened.
There isn\'t much difference between the two opinions.
Tom wondered where Mary was planning to go to college.
You know how much I\'ve always wanted to go to Boston.
You ought to tell Tom that you don\'t like doing that.
When do you think Tom is going to want us to help him?
You\'ll be lucky to find something to eat around here.
Are there any other problems that need taking care of?
